snippet: The guns Joseph Kindig collected, which will be on exhibit at the Reading Public Museum in Pennsylvania, were each the work of a single artisan.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; early 19th-century rifles collected by antiques dealer Joseph Kindig Jr will go on display in exhibit at Reading Public Museum in Pennsylvania; Adam Parfrey book Citizen Keane: The Big Lies Behind the Big Eyes reveals lurid details in story of Walter Keane, who rose to fame in 1960s via his paintings of sad-eyed waifs.
lead_paragraph: The guns Joseph Kindig collected, which will be on exhibit at the Reading Public Museum in Pennsylvania, were each the work of a single artisan.

headline.main: Created by Hand: Lock, Stock and Barrel
